name: Fidget Spinner Simulator
description:
Whirl the fidget spinner, ride the hoverboard, vape your dank mod and enjoy the scenery. The whole trend theme of 2017 is in this game!Controls:
  • Use Arrows or W A S D in order to navigate the hoverboard.
  • Use Left-Shift to accelerate.
  • Press "R" to reset your position.
  • Use Mouse to look around.
  • Press Space to activate and deactivate the fidget spinner.
NOW INCLUDES MULTI-PLAYER:
  • Ride hoverboard!
  • Whirl your spinner!
  • Enjoy Private/Public Lobbies with your friends or make new ones!
Attention:
We do not promote smoking or vaping. The whole idea of having smoking devices in game is just for fun. Do not attempt trying vaping or smoking if you are underage. Or even if you aren't, better stay out of it and keep it safe!

Enjoy, and don't get crazy on this one!
